strong: Leading specialty Retailer within the Fortune 500 space is building out its Data Science practice and looking to hire Data Scientists!

text: : Data Scientist will perform predictive analytics including apply machine learning to solve critical business needs across the Enterprise ranging from: customer experience, marketing optimization, demand planning, margin optimization, and econometrics.

li: work with key strategic partners across the Enterprise, understand areas of opportunity, and apply predictive analytics that address critical business needs
li.1: apply machine learning on customer transactions, demographic, digital, and economic data that optimize the following initiatives: customer experience, marketing, demand planning, margins
li.2: deploy machine learning algorithms to optimize marketing initiatives: customer lifetime value (CLTV), grow customer base and loyalty, mitigate customer churn, look-alike audience targeting, attribution, ROI
li.3: utilize predictive modeling and machine learning to evolve customer strategies as it pertains to margin optimization including pricing and revenue growth
li.4: build predictive models to optimize demand planning initiatives including forecasting customer demand and consumption trends
li.5: leverage machine learning on economics data to understand business impact given current market conditions i.e. labor shortage, inflation, supply chain challenges, etc.
li.6: take analytical findings and infuse them into short / long term business strategies
li.7: build dashboards to visualize leading KPI
li.8: provide data storytelling on all analysis performed

li: full-time role that is 100% remote with great benefits
bachelors / Master's degree within a quantitative and technical discipline
li.1: must have 2+ years of applied predictive analytics experience including predictive modeling and machine learning
li.2: proficiency with Python or R is highly desired
